NAME: Arrow Rain
DESCRIPTION: Deal physical and magical wind damage to enemies.

NAME: Nature Inspiration
DESCRIPTION: Heal yourself for some amount and get a shield for 20% of your MAXHP.

NAME: Penetrate Defenses
DESCRIPTION: Deal some physical damage to an enemy. Reduces their physical and magical defense.

NAME: Enchant Weapons
DESCRIPTION: Recover some MP and increase your magical and physical attack.

NAME: Rainbow Arrow
DESCRIPTION: Shoot a high physical damage arrow containing the power of all elements, always striking the enemy weakness.

NAME: Frost Fang
DESCRIPTION: Inflict moderate ice physical damage to an enemy.
